function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Occupational exposure to contagious diseases from sampling sewage","Impact":"Potential transmission of infectious agents to individuals performing sewage sampling","Mitigation":"Proper training, use of personal protective equipment, and adherence to safety protocols","Technologies":"Biological hazard detection systems, automated sewage sampling equipment","People":"Individuals performing sewage sampling and analysis","Owner":"Public health organizations, sewage management authorities"},{"Description":"Limitation of WBE to direct measures of viral infection such as PCR or antigen testing","Impact":"Reduced effectiveness in detecting contagious diseases in the built environment","Mitigation":"Expansion of WBE to target endogenous biomarkers of infection, use of immunoassays, and evaluation of systemic inflammatory biomarkers","Technologies":"Immunological assay technologies, biomarker detection platforms","People":"Public health researchers, scientists, and WBE practitioners","Owner":"Public health organizations, research institutions"},{"Description":"Inadequate sampling and sample preparation for sewage analysis","Impact":"Inaccurate detection of infectious agents in sewage samples","Mitigation":"Standardization of sampling methods, proper sample handling and storage, and use of advanced analytical techniques","Technologies":"Automated sewage sampling equipment, sample preservation technologies, advanced analytical instruments","People":"Individuals responsible for sewage sampling and analysis","Owner":"Sewage management authorities, environmental health agencies"}]}
